name: Russian Warship: GFY
description:
Try yourself as one of ukrainian soldiers on island that is attacked by russian warships! Send as many of them back, as you can.

For now there's not so many features, but planning to extend functionality in future:

  • more features like bayraktars, jets (and maybe tractors);
  • recreate Zmijinyy island;
  • meme content related to subject;
